install.name: Simple Email Form
install.author: unlikelysource.com
install.description: Presents a simple email form with up to 6 fields + CAPTCHA + 16 languages

param.name: mod_SEF_defaultLang
param.label: Default Language
param.description: Choose the default language

param.name: mod_SEF_emailTo
param.label: Send Results To
param.description: Send results to this email address

param.name: mod_SEF_emailCC
param.label: Send Results CC
param.description: Send a CC email of results to this email address

param.name: mod_SEF_emailBCC
param.label: Send Results BCC
param.description: Send a BCC email of results to this email address

param.name: mod_SEF_emailFile
param.label: Directory to Save Attachments
param.description: Enter the absolute directory path for email attachment files

param.name: mod_SEF_cssClass
param.label: Name of CSS Class
param.description: Enter the name of a CSS class to use with the form

param.name: mod_SEF_labelAlign
param.label: Label Alignment
param.description: Choose to have the labels aligned LEFT,RIGHT, or CENTER

param.name: mod_SEF_useCaptcha
param.label: Use Captcha
param.description: To use a 'Captcha' to foil spammers, select 'I' for an image captcha (requires additional configuration), or 'T' for a text captcha.

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaDir
param.label: Directory to Write Captchas
param.description: Enter the absolute directory path where the module can write 'captchas' (i.e. /var/www/application/images

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaURL
param.label: URL for Captcha Directory
param.description: Enter a URL which corresponds with the Captcha Directory (above)

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaLen
param.label: Captcha Word Lengh
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha word length (number of characters)

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaSize
param.label: Captcha Font Size
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha font size

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaWidth
param.label: Captcha Width
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha width in pixels

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaHeight
param.label: Captcha Height
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha height in pixels

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaTxtColor
param.label: Captcha Text Color
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha text color

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaLinesColor
param.label: Captcha Lines Color
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha lines color

param.name: mod_SEF_captchaBgColor
param.label: Captcha Background Color
param.description: Enter the desired Captcha background color

param.name: mod_SEF_subjectline
param.label: Subject Line
param.description: This is the subject line of the email which will be sent when the form is submitted (i.e. http://example.com/images)

param.name: mod_SEF_subjectsize
param.label: Size of Subject Line
param.description: The size of the 1st subject which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_subjectlabel
param.label: Label for Subject Line
param.description: The label for the 1st subject which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_fromsize
param.label: Size of From Field
param.description: The size of the 1st field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_fromlabel
param.label: Label for From Field
param.description: The label for the 'From' field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_errorTxtColor
param.label: Error Text Color
param.description: Enter the desired HTML text color for errors

param.name: mod_SEF_successTxtColor
param.label: Success Text Color
param.description: Enter the desired HTML text color for success

param.name: mod_SEF_field1active
param.label: Activate Field 1
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to activate field 1 and 'R' to activate and make it required

param.name: mod_SEF_field1size
param.label: Size of Field 1
param.description: The size of the From field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_field1label
param.label: Label for Field 1
param.description: The label for the 1st field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_field1maxx
param.label: Max length of Field 1
param.description: Maximum number of characters that the field accepts

param.label: Activate Field 2
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to activate field 2 and 'R' to activate and make it required

param.name: mod_SEF_field2size
param.label: Size of Field 2

param.label: Label for Field 2

param.label: Max length of Field 3
param.description: Maximum number of characters that the field accepts

param.name: mod_SEF_field4size
param.label: Size of Field 4
param.description: The size of the 1st field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_field4label
param.label: Label for Field 4
param.description: The label for the 1st field which will appear in your email form

param.label: Size of Field 5
param.description: The size of the 1st field which will appear in your email form

param.name: mod_SEF_textareaActive
param.label: Activate Textarea
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to activate field 6 and 'R' to activate and make it required

param.name: mod_SEF_textareaRows
param.label: Textarea rows
param.description: How many rows in the textarea (vertical)

param.name: mod_SEF_textareaCols
param.label: Textarea cols
param.description: How many columns in the textarea (horizontal)

param.name: mod_SEF_textareaLabel
param.label: Label for the Textarea
param.description: The label for the textarea

param.name: mod_SEF_uploadActive
param.label: Activate Email Attachment Upload Field
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to activate a file upload field for email attachments

param.name: mod_SEF_uploadAllowed
param.label: Allowed Attachment Filenames
param.description: Enter a list of allowed filename extensions separated by commas. Example: if you want jpg,png, or gif, then enter 'jpg,png,gif'. Leave blank to allow ANY type of file.

param.name: mod_SEF_copymeLabel
param.label: Label for the Send Me A Copy Field
param.description: The label for the Send Me A Copy Field

param.name: mod_SEF_copymeActive
param.label: Send Me A Copy Field
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to activate a field which lets users send a copy to themselves

param.name: mod_SEF_copymeAuto
param.label: Send User a Copy Automatically
param.description: Select 'Y' if you want to send a copy to users automatically
